snippet.title: Release trailer The Witch's Cauldron (EN)
snippet.description:
The Witch's Cauldron is a simulator of a medieval witch from the young indie team Harvey Games.

You have to create in a town where good rumor precedes your deeds, however, bad fame reaches the ears of the inquisitors at the same speed. The balance between popularity among the townspeople and increased attention from the inquisitors is the main condition for survival in this place. And if your witch’s instincts tell you that your end is near, find refuge in any other city, fortunately there are countless of them nearby.

But this is in the future, but for now the bard, the vampire, the innkeeper, and even the king himself are rushing to bow to you! Fulfill their requests, brew potions, but do not forget that every good or evil deed will have inevitable consequences.

Local residents will come to you every day. Some are in search of treatment, some are out of curiosity, while others are not at all averse to concocting shady affairs.

By choosing potions you influence the development of further events. However, only a small part of simple potions will be available from the start; you will have to discover new and more complex ones by mixing ingredients or receiving recipes and tips from NPCs. Opened potions, no matter how your next story ends, will be saved for the next round.

The abundance of potions and plot twists provide high variability in playthroughs. Some endings, potions and game mechanics will only become available after completing the main story for the first time or completing certain game events that complete the game.

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2251010/The_Witchs_Cauldron/

Come join our Discord channel, where we can discuss the game:https://discord.gg/sbGJDWqq
Well, Boosty, for those who want to support me and my team:https://boosty.to/edvard-dante

#indie #indiegame #witch #cozy #cozygames
